content:
Build Analysis Summary:

SUCCESSFULLY BUILT TARGETS:
- core_engine.lib (with encoding warnings)
- platform_abstraction.lib 
- sdk_impl.lib (with compilation errors in service_base.cpp - FIXED)
- music-player.exe
- final_wav_player.exe  
- test_decoders.exe
- test_audio_direct.exe
- plugin_flac_decoder.dll
- plugin_mp3_decoder.dll
- plugin_wav_decoder.dll

FAILED TARGETS:
- foobar2k-player.exe (compilation errors)
- test_cross_platform.exe (linking errors)

MAIN ISSUES FIXED:
1. service_base.cpp compilation errors - resolved missing type declarations
2. Encoding issues in critical header files - converted to ASCII

REMAINING ISSUES:
1. C4819 encoding warnings in 14+ files
2. C4244 data conversion warnings  
3. C4100/C4189 unused variable warnings
4. foobar2k-player.exe compilation errors
5. test_cross_platform.exe linking errors
